plot: An alien device with metamorphic properties crash lands on Earth and attaches itself to an often-grousing juvenile who's on a road trip with extended family.

Ben goes on a road trip with his Grandpa Max and cousin Gwen for summer vacation. When they stop at a forest, a meteor crashes nearby. Ben approaches the remains, and an alien device attaches itself to his wrist, allowing him to change into ten different otherworldly creatures. As Ben learns to use the watch and its menagerie of super-powered life-forms, an evil force lurks in space intent on taking it.—Jesse Sanchez
